content: if you re wondering what you can crochet for halloween you have to make some of these crochet halloween candy bags there are four bags to choose from they re simple to make and your kids will get to show off how talented you are when they go trick or treating you will learn how to make a halloween pumpkin bag a crochet witch bag a skeleton head bag and a frankenstein bag i don t know if it s just me but i don t think you could choose a better collection of halloween candy bags you can even make them for purposes outside of trick or treating there is a written tutorial for each character a 2-part video tutorial or you can purchase the discounted pdf bundle with all four bags included materials needed * red heart super saver - 1 skein in each color per character if you re making all four you only need one skein in each color plus an extra green * 5 5mm crochet hook * 5mm crochet hook optional
